english.segment1: I've found love, as deep as the ocean, And your eyes, they hit me like a train. And your words serenade me like the sweetest of songs. Here I find peace again, again
english.segment2: I will follow, I will follow. I will follow, I will follow
english.segment3: There's a song, and it's louder than music. Can you hear me when there's no sound?. Joy, coz I dance with the angels. Take me higher, I'm not coming down. And your words serenade me like the sweetest of songs. Here I find peace again
english.segment4: I will follow, I will follow. I will follow, I will follow
